name: Đặng Tấn Tài
bio_1: I'm aliased as Tai at work.
bio_2: I'm a learner, builder, and freedom seeker.
bio_3: I live in Ho Chi Minh, Viet Nam.
bio_4: I was born in the beautiful Binh Dinh plateau.
bio_5: My first programming language I learned was Pascal.
bio_7: I'm focusing on building eCommerce software.
bio_8: I work mostly with Java technologies.
bio_16: I love playing video games, PES is my favorite one.
bio_start_coding: I started learning to code in 2016 and have been hooked ever since.
bio_first_job: I landed my first job as a Javascript coding mentor in 2017.
bio_passion: I have a passion for Java, mobile dev, and eCommerce.
bio_blog_purpose: I started this blog to document and share my knowledge & experience.
lost_message: Hmm.. it seems that you're lost
return_message: But don't worry, you can find plenty of other things on my homepage.

blog.intro: I write mostly about Application development, tech related, and sometime about my personal life. Use the search below to filter by title.
